snippet: Ms. Jeffers’s popular titles included “Feel the Fear and Do It Anyway” and other books that encouraged self-confidence.
abstract: Susan Jeffers, influential psychologist and author of 18 self-help books, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Jeffers’s popular titles included “Feel the Fear and Do It Anyway” and other books that encouraged self-confidence.

headline.seo: Susan Jeffers, Psychologist and Self-Help Author, Dies at 74
headline.main: Susan Jeffers, Psychologist and Author, Dies at 74
headline.print_headline: Susan Jeffers, Psychologist And Author, Is Dead at 74
